raw_markdown='[ Protonet, Inc. ](https://protonet.info/<https:/protonet.com> "Homepage")
  * [SOUL](https://protonet.info/<https:/protonet.com/products/project-management/>)
  * [Blog](https://protonet.info/<https:/protonet.com/blog/>)
  * [Support](https://protonet.info/<https:/support.protonet.info/de/hilfe/>)
  * [Contact](https://protonet.info/<https:/protonet.com/company/contact/>)


## Protonet SOUL
# The no. 1 solution for communication and collaboration in safe environments.
  * Protonet Private Cloud Server
  * On Premise
  * Private Cloud


[Demo Video](https://protonet.info/<https:/www.youtube.com/embed/A9zSuR80DQA?autoplay=1>) [live trial](https://protonet.info/<https:/protonet.com/live-trial>)
# Protonet SOUL
  * Clear Design
  * Customizable Dashboards
  * Group Chats & One-on-One Chats
  * Video Chats
  * To-Do Lists
  * File Management
  * Syncable Calendar


## Features
  * ![](https://protonet.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/06/soul_features_manage_projects_independently-1.png)
**Clearly structured design** for an unlimited amount of projects, discussions, search results, to-dos, appointments, notes, files, folders and dashboards. 
  * ![](https://protonet.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/06/soul_features_create_projects_with_structure-1.png)
**Customizable dashboards** help you keep an eye on the most important tasks and events. Embed to-do lists, notes, folders oder external content.
  * ![](https://protonet.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/06/soul_features_quickly_exchange_ideas-1-1.png)
**Group and one-on-one chats** allow for quick exchange of ideas, no matter where team members sit. Retrieve conversations at any time and keep track of every exchange.
  * ![](https://protonet.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/06/soul_features_video_chat.png)
**Video chats** enable you and your team to collaborate in realtime. One-on-one conversations and business meetings can be started from anywhere with a click of a button.
  * ![](https://protonet.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/06/soul_features_keep_projects_on_plan-1.png)
**To-do lists** help you stay on target with your projects. Prioritize important deliverables, manage deadlines and responsibilites and measure the completion of tasks.
  * ![](https://protonet.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/06/soul_features_share_documents-1.png)
**Data management** for sharing and storing files publicly and locally – no matter how large or sensitive.
  * ![](https://protonet.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/06/soul_features_share_synchronized_calendar-1.png)
**Synchronized calendars** enable you to create and manage events with your team. Everyone is up-to-date. Always.
  *     * [![](https://protonet.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/apple-1.png@3x-1.png)](https://protonet.info/<https:/itunes.apple.com/us/app/protonet-messenger/id927023657?l=de&ls=1&mt=8>)
    * [![](https://protonet.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/google-2.png@3x-2.png)](https://protonet.info/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=info.protonet.messenger>)
**Stay in touch** with your team via the Protonet Messenger app for iOS® and Android®. Access your projects anytime and anywhere.


## Try SOUL now.
[live trial](https://protonet.info/<https:/protonet.com/live-trial>)
## More than 2500 clients
![](https://protonet.com/wp-content/themes/protonet2018/img/home_kundenlogos.png)
## What Our Clients Say
  * ![](https://protonet.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/06/testimonials_marco_hausmann.png)
_We use Protonet for training our employees. It has proved to be a valuable learning platform and onboarding tool. Awesome!_
**Marco Hausmann** Head of Technical Training [Gebr. Becker GmbH](https://protonet.info/<http:/www.becker-international.com/>)
  * ![](https://protonet.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/06/testimonials_stephan_hansen_oest.png)
_Exchanging confidential data with our clients has never been so convenient. Sensitive information is kept in confidence._
**Stephan Hansen-Oest** Lawyer and Data Protection Officer [@sayho](https://protonet.info/<https:/twitter.com/sayho>)
  * ![](https://protonet.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/06/testimonials_thorsten_bastian.png)
_Our team as well as our clients are stoked about the convenience, team work and data sovereignty._
**Thorsten Bastian** Founder & Owner basta!media Multimedia Fullservice [@bastamedia](https://protonet.info/<https:/twitter.com/bastamedia>)


## Get to know SOUL.
[Individual Offer](https://protonet.info/<https:/protonet.com/company/contact/>)
![](https://protonet.com/wp-content/themes/protonet2018/img/phoenix.svg)
## Protonet is back
In the last months, we have devoted all of our time and energy to our overriding vision. Our goal was to continually provide our services and support with Protonet SOUL in our proven quality. With a new structure and solid foundation, we are proud to say: We are back. Read more about recent challenges and current chances:
  * [![Handelsblatt](https://protonet.com/wp-content/themes/protonet2018/img/phoenix-logos/handelsblatt.png)](https://protonet.info/<http:/www.handelsblatt.com/unternehmen/mittelstand/familienunternehmer/protonet-ehemaliger-start-up-star-ali-jelveh-wagt-ein-comeback/22597282.html?ticket=ST-3842807-PctYjBXq7ceaSr7yN3jU-ap2>)
  * [![Gründerszene](https://protonet.com/wp-content/themes/protonet2018/img/phoenix-logos/gruenderszene.png)](https://protonet.info/<https:/www.gruenderszene.de/business/ali-jelveh-protonet-comeback>)
  * [![t3n - digital pioneers](https://protonet.com/wp-content/themes/protonet2018/img/phoenix-logos/t3n.png)](https://protonet.info/<https:/t3n.de/news/protonet-ali-jelveh-1079498/>)

generated_description:
### Protonet: Simplifying Business Communication

**Overview**: Protonet is on a mission to empower small businesses by providing an intuitive platform for communication and collaboration. At the heart of its offering is **Protonet SOUL**, a solution designed to facilitate safe communication environments, combining hardware and cloud computing.

**Background**: While specific data on its inception and location is missing, Protonet is proud to be a member of the **Y Combinator Batch W16**, establishing its legitimacy in the competitive startup landscape. 

**Products and Services**: Protonet SOUL is the centerpiece of their offerings. It features:
- **Protonet Private Cloud Server**: Suitable for on-premise as well as private cloud settings.
- **User-Friendly Features**: 
  - Clearly structured interface for project management.
  - Customizable dashboards to keep projects on track.
  - Real-time communication via group chats and video calls.
  - Integrated tools for task management and file sharing, corresponding seamlessly with team calendars.

You can even access their offerings through the **Protonet Messenger app**, available for both iOS and Android, ensuring that connectivity goes beyond the desktop.

**Client Base & Testimonials**: The company boasts over **2,500 clients**, with many praising the platform for its seamless data management and ease of use. Clients have noted its effectiveness for training, confidentiality in client interactions, and overall enhancement of teamwork.

**Recent Developments**: Protonet has focused on restructuring and enhancing its service quality, declaring a strong return to the market after navigating recent challenges. Their renewed commitment promises to bolster support and quality for users, adapting to the evolving needs of small businesses.

For more information or to start a live trial, you can visit their [website](https://protonet.info) or check out their [blog](https://protonet.info/blog) for updates and insights.

In simple terms, Protonet is about making collaboration easier, safer, and more efficient for small businesses—because everyone's productivity deserves a reliable backbone.
